End of the Pallavas

Son of Vijayalaya, Aditya I established the Chola empire as an independent power. He assisted the Pallava king Aparajita in the battle of Sri Purambiyam but later killed him and annexed Tondaimandalam (Northern Tamil Nadu). This victory marked the end of the Pallava dynasty.

ЁЯПЫя╕П
Shiva Temples

Aditya I was a great patron of Shaivism. It is said that he constructed 108 Shiva temples along the banks of the River Kaveri.
